item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built a hardware processor that runs Python (401 points | 109 comments)
2. Reports of widespread power cuts in Spain and Portugal (558 points | 545 comments)
3. Show HN: Autarkie – Instant grammar fuzzing using Rust macros (12 points | discuss)
4. Uncovering the mechanics of The Games: Winter Challenge (179 points | 85 comments)
5. Show HN: Web-eval-agent – Let the coding agent debug itself (9 points | 1 comment)
6. Tiny-LLM – a course of serving LLM on Apple Silicon for systems engineers (80 points | 5 comments)
7. Reanimation of the original Logic Theorist, the first AI, in IPL-V (8 points | 1 comment)
8. Internet in a Box (765 points | 194 comments)
9. Show HN: I made a web-based, free alternative to Screen Studio (373 points | 83 comments)
10. AI helps unravel a cause of Alzheimer’s and identify a therapeutic candidate (282 points | 130 comments)
11. Ask HN: What are you working on? (April 2025) (215 points | 611 comments)
12. Optery (YC W22) – Engineering Team Lead and Engineers with Node.js (U.S., Latam) ( | hide)
13. How a single line of code could brick your iPhone (422 points | 101 comments)
14. Reversing the Fossilization of Computer Science Conferences (57 points | 36 comments)
15. Presentation Slides with Markdown (166 points | 53 comments)
16. Why Pale Blue Dot generates feelings of cosmic insignificance (5 points | 1 comment)
17. Inference-Aware Fine-Tuning for Best-of-N Sampling in Large Language Models (59 points | 8 comments)
18. AI Goes to College for the Free Money (6 points | discuss)
19. To 'Reclaim Future-Making', Amazon Workers Published Collection of SciFi Stories (75 points | 57 comments)
20. New material gives copper superalloy-like strength (145 points | 84 comments)
21. Read the Obits (258 points | 102 comments)
22. Did 5G kill the IMSI catcher? (240 points | 101 comments)
23. The hospital where staff treat fear of death as well as physical pain (79 points | 73 comments)
24. The suburban office park that launched Silicon Valley (109 points | 25 comments)
25. I just want to code (2023) (243 points | 145 comments)
26. Reverse geocoding is hard (251 points | 120 comments)
27. Show HN: I486SX_soft_FPU – Software FPU Emulator for NetBSD 10 on 486SX (99 points | 33 comments)
28. Boxie – an always offline audio player for my 3 year old (187 points | 60 comments)
29. China's Clinical Trial Boom (12 points | discuss)
30. The coming knowledge-work supply-chain crisis (235 points | 147 comments)
